names.japanese: ベルメールのみかん畑

description: The tangerine orchard that was tended by Bellemere and is now maintained by Nojiko. This is where Nami buried her accumulated treasure of 93 million berries.

keyEvents.event: Nezumi and his Marines discover Nami's buried treasure of 93 million berries
keyEvents.significance: The location where Nami's eight years of work and hope are destroyed

keyEvents.event: Nojiko is shot by Nezumi while trying to protect the treasure
keyEvents.significance: The orchard becomes a site of violence and betrayal

culturalSignificance: The tangerine orchard represents Bellemere's legacy and Nami's connection to her adoptive mother. The fact that Nami chose to hide her treasure here shows how important this place is to her.
geographicalDetails: Located in or near Cocoyasi Village on the island

description: Nami's home village, oppressed by the Arlong Pirates for eight years.

keyEvents.event: Nezumi and Marines arrive to confiscate Nami's treasure
keyEvents.significance: Reveals the extent of corruption - even the Marines oppress the village

keyEvents.event: Nami stabs her Arlong Pirates tattoo in the village street
keyEvents.significance: The most emotionally powerful moment in the Arlong Park arc occurs here

keyEvents.event: Luffy places his straw hat on Nami's head and declares he will help
keyEvents.significance: One of the most iconic scenes in One Piece history takes place in this village

keyEvents.event: Villagers arm themselves to join the fight against Arlong
keyEvents.significance: The village transitions from submission to resistance

culturalSignificance: Represents the struggle of ordinary people against tyranny and corruption

description: The headquarters of the Arlong Pirates, a fortress-like complex that serves as the center of Arlong's control over the region.

keyEvents.event: Nami confronts Arlong about the stolen treasure and broken promise
keyEvents.significance: Arlong reveals his betrayal and true manipulative nature

keyEvents.event: The Straw Hat crew arrives at Arlong Park ready for battle
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the climactic battle of the arc

culturalSignificance: Symbolizes oppression and the power structure that must be destroyed for the village to be free
